subject: Golf
Advertising and Marketing
PGA Championship
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson’s barbed sense of humor, usually confined to P.G.A. Tour locker rooms, will be on display in a new batch of golf themed television ads.
snippet: Phil Mickelson’s barbed sense of humor, usually confined to P.G.A. Tour locker rooms, will be on display in a new batch of golf themed television ads.
